name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090
description: The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 is a flagship GPU based on the Ada Lovelace architecture, offering unparalleled performance for gaming and creative work.

name: AMD Radeon RX 7900 XTX
description: AMD's top-of-the-line GPU, the Radeon RX 7900 XTX, competes directly with NVIDIA's best, offering excellent performance at a slightly lower price point.

name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080
description: A step down from the flagship, the RTX 4080 still delivers formidable performance for gaming and professional applications, making it a popular choice for enthusiasts.

name: AMD Radeon RX 7900 XT
description: The Radeon RX 7900 XT offers great performance for its price, making it an attractive option for gamers looking to get high-end performance without breaking the bank.
